entry.value: SELECT * FROM Transactions.filing_status WHERE assesment_year=:assessmentYear AND quarter=:quarter AND deductor_tan=:tanNumber AND form_type=:formType;

UPDATE Transactions.filing_status SET assesment_year=?,quarter=?,deductor_id=?,deductor_pan=?, deductor_tan=?,duedate_for_filing=?,file_type=?,filing_type=?,pnr_or_token_number=?, quarter_end_date=?,quarter_period=?,quarter_start_date=?,request_number=?, revision_exists=?,status=?,active=?, updated_by=?,updated_date=? WHERE filing_status_id=?;
SELECT * FROM Transactions.filing_status WHERE assesment_year=:assessmentYear AND quarter=:quarter AND file_type=:formType AND deductor_tan=:deductorTan;
SELECT * FROM Transactions.filing_status WHERE assesment_year=:assessmentYear AND quarter=:quarter AND filing_status_id=:id;
SELECT * FROM Transactions.tcs_filing_files WHERE assesment_year=:year AND collector_tan=:collectorTan ;

SELECT filing_files_id AS FilingFilesId,assesment_year AS AssesmentYear,quarter AS Quarter,active AS Active, created_by AS CreatedBy,created_date AS CreatedDate, deductor_id AS DeductorId,deductor_tan AS DeductorTan, file_status AS FileStatus,file_type AS FileType,file_url AS FileUrl,filing_type AS FilingType,generated_date AS GeneratedDate, is_requested AS IsRequested,request_number AS RequestNumber,updated_by AS UpdatedBy,updated_date AS UpdatedDate,form_type AS formType, consolidated_file_hash as consolidatedFileHash FROM Transactions.filing_files WHERE assesment_year=:assessmentYear AND quarter=:quarter AND deductor_tan=:tanNumber AND form_type=:formType AND filing_type=:fileType ;
select * from Transactions.form_15_filing_details where assessment_year =:assessmentYear and deductor_tan =:deductorTan and file_type =:fileType and file_format =:fileFormat
select * from Transactions.invoice_shareholder_non_resident isnr where deductor_master_pan =:deductorPan and is_parent =1 and assessment_year=:year and date_of_posting =:dateOfPosting

select * from Transactions.invoice_shareholder_resident where deductor_master_tan =:deductorTan and is_parent =1 and assessment_year=:assessmentYear and document_posting_month in(:month1,:month2,:month3) and form15gh_applicable=1;
select * from Transactions.invoice_shareholder_non_resident where deductor_master_pan=:deductorPan and is_parent =1 and invoice_id in
